query:
SELECT lm.id, lm.title, lm.subjectId, lm.userId, s.id as subject_id, s.name as subjectName 
FROM learning_modules lm 
LEFT JOIN subjects s ON lm.subjectId = s.id 
WHERE lm.subjectId IN (SELECT id FROM subjects WHERE id LIKE '%120001%' OR name LIKE '%Inform%')
LIMIT 20;
